  • havoc.autoval.tests.cycle_test.cycletest

Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.cycle_test.cycletest

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

import copy
import os

from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.system_config import SystemConfig
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.test_utils_runner import TestUtilsRunner



[docs]class CycleTest(TestBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self):
        super(CycleTest, self).__init__()
        self.cycle_count = self.test_control.get("cycle_count", 1)
        self.cycle_type = self.test_control.get("cycle_type", "ac")
        self.stop_on_error = self.test_control.get("stop_on_error", False)
        self.gpv2Slot = self.test_control.get("gpv2", False)
        # App to run between Power cycles
        self.test_utility = self.test_control.get("test_utility", None)



[docs]    def setup(self):
        super(CycleTest, self).setup(inband_config_check=False)
        if self.test_utility:
            self.test_utils_runner = TestUtilsRunner(
                self.host, self.test_utility["name"], self.test_utility["args"]
            )
            self.test_utils_runner.test_setup()
        self.validate_condition(True, "cycle 0 - starting (baseline)")

        if self.gpv2Slot:
            #execute on gpv2_slot
            self.host.oob.gpv2power(self.host, self.cycle_type)
        else:
            # Execute on default server slot
            self.host.cycle_host(self.host, self.cycle_type)

        self.validate_condition(True, "cycle 0 - done")
        self.validate_no_exception(
            self.host.run, ["hostname"], "connected to %s" % self.host.hostname
        )
        self.validate_no_exception(self.host.oob.ping, [], "ping OOB successful")



[docs]    def execute(self):
        self.log_info("This is the %s cycle test" % self.cycle_type)
        self.log_info("Target to cycle %s times" % self.cycle_count)
        # Get initial config
        cfg_init = SystemConfig.config_check(self.host)
        dir_to_copy = os.path.join(self.system_log_dir, "iter")
        os.mkdir(dir_to_copy)
        cfg_init.update(self.host.oob.get_config(dir_to_copy, self.test_start_time))
        self.validate_condition(cfg_init, "Config check")
        cfg_filter = self.get_cycle_config_filter()

        for n in range(1, self.cycle_count + 1):
            self.validate_condition(True, "cycle %d - starting" % n)
            if self.gpv2Slot:
                #execute on gpv2_slot
                self.host.oob.gpv2power(self.host, self.cycle_type)
            else:
                self.host.cycle_host(self.host, self.cycle_type)
            self.validate_condition(True, "cycle %d - done" % n)
            if self.test_utility:
                self.validate_no_exception(
                    self.test_utils_runner.start_test,
                    [],
                    " %s start_test()" % self.test_utility["name"],
                )
                self.validate_no_exception(
                    self.test_utils_runner.parse_results,
                    [],
                    " %s parse_results()" % self.test_utility["name"],
                )
            self.validate_no_exception(
                self.host.run, ["hostname"], "connected to %s" % self.hostname
            )
            self.validate_no_exception(self.host.oob.ping, [], "ping OOB successful")

            # Get config and compare
            cfg2 = SystemConfig.config_check(self.host)
            cfg2.update(
                self.host.oob.get_config(dir_to_copy, self.test_start_time, start=False)
            )
            SystemConfig.compare_configs(cfg_init, cfg2, cfg_filter, self.stop_on_error)
            cfg_init = copy.deepcopy(cfg2)



[docs]    def get_cycle_config_filter(self):
        cfg_filter = []
        cfg_filter.append({"filter_name": "cycletest"})
        return cfg_filter



[docs]    def cleanup(self):
        super(CycleTest, self).cleanup(inband_config_check=False)




[docs]def main():
    test = CycleTest()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
